title: 'It's good to scare people sometimes': Anduril founder Palmer Luckey says he 'broadly' backs Trump's new defense regulations
full_text: 'It's good to scare people sometimes': Anduril founder Palmer Luckey says he 'broadly' backs Trump's new defense regulations. "I'd say I'm broadly aligned," Anduril founder Palmer Luckey said in an interview on Wednesday, adding that some of Trump's plans might be "bad moves.". Palmer Luckey, founder of Erebor Bank and Anduril Industries.PATRICK T. FALLON/AFP via Getty Images <ul><li>Anduril founder Palmer Luckey has voiced support for the Trump administration's new regula… [+2745 chars]
